0.Cons: Don't care about collegePeople in the company are incredibly jealous of everyoneSupervisors only listen to gmsNo one appreciates anyone

1.Pros: Very flexible schedule, you meet quite a few people through this job as the turn-over rate tends to be high for these kinds of jobs., discounted food for crew members and free food for managers, plenty of opportunities to advance within the job, on-the-job training is fantastic and highly detailed.
1.Cons: It is to be expected that the pay for working in a fast food restaurant leaves much to be desired, however the work load expected of the senior managers and even such manager-trainees is heavy and many feel they are not compensated well enough. Work holidays without holiday pay (mandatory for managers)

2.Pros: You get to meet a lot of different people. I got to help out people which I love.
2.Cons: You encounter all kinds of people. Everybody has their days so you have to be mindful of that

3.Pros: Great with employees. They also have great work parties. They are about their employees.
3.Cons: If your really good at the job they will try to keep you past your schedule.

5.Pros: This job prepared me for many others that I never would have expected. Experience at McDonalds is pretty valued by employers because it shows dedication and discipline.
5.Cons: The job isn't always clean, and I recieved my share of burns from grease or other hot surfaces.

6.Pros: Food discounts, flexible schedule, no advanced skills really needed, pretty easy to get a job there. Good first job for a teen.
6.Cons: Many employees have bad attitudes, managers are on a power trip, and day versus night shift is a complete opposite experience.

7.Pros: GREAT experience, where do I even start
7.Cons: Nothing bad to say. Life is great.

8.Summary: "It Has the Highest Turnover Rate in the Country for a Reason."
8.Pros: - Easy tasks- Negotiable Hours- Opportunities for Rapid Advancement
8.Cons: - Busy work- Rude customers- Incompetent Staff and Management

9.Cons: Too much grease, cloths will smell
